about_the_game:
TINY REALMS
Embark on an exhilarating cooperative adventure in TINY REALMS Co-op, a gripping roguelite that challenges you and your friends to brave perilous small arena-like levels, battling ferocious monsters, and amassing XP and loot to ascend to newfound strength. This fast-paced dungeon crawler invites you to join forces with fellow warriors as you strategize, conquer challenges, and overcome the ever-escalating difficulty of procedurally generated levels.



Key Features:

🔥 Cooperative Roguelite Action: Team up with friends for an fun cooperative gaming experience, combining your unique skills and abilities to conquer the realms.

⚔️ Battle Through Small Arenas: Navigate compact yet dynamic arenas filled with hordes of menacing monsters. Adapt to the ever-changing environment and devise cunning tactics to emerge victorious.



📈 Earn XP and Loot: Defeat enemies to earn valuable experience points and collect epic loot that enhances your character's abilities. Customize your playstyle as you progress, unlocking powerful skills and upgrades.

👹 Face Formidable Bosses: Challenge massive bosses that guard each level, each with their own distinct mechanics and deadly attacks. Only the strongest and most coordinated teams will emerge victorious.



🌐 Procedurally Generated Levels: Experience endless replayability with procedurally generated levels that keep the challenges fresh and unpredictable. No two runs are ever the same, providing a new adventure each time.

🤝 Teamwork is Key: Communicate and coordinate with your teammates to tackle the toughest challenges. Build a diverse team with different classes and abilities to overcome the varied obstacles that stand in your way.

Are you ready to embark on a thrilling journey of conquest and camaraderie? Gather your allies, gear up, and dive into the heart of Dungeon Conquest Co-op – where only the bravest adventurers emerge triumphant!

name: Tiny Realms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 (Version 1909 or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (2048 MB) / AMD Radeon RX 470 (2048 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 (Version 1909 or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (4 * 3500)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (2048 MB) / Radeon R9 Fury (4096 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Level up your tiny heroes with earned XP, unlocking an array of powerful abilities and upgrades. As you delve deeper into the realms, gather an assortment of loot, to increase youre strength and defeat challanging bosses.
